review.title: “It's a fun and technically challenging environment suited to high performers looking for the long term win.”
review.pros: Pros – Interesting and technically challenging work.Lots of different projects.Competitive pay, plus generous profit sharing paid quarterly.Stock options offer long term potential for wealth.
review.cons: Cons – Still small enough where you have to wear more than one hat.Engineering priorities are driven by customer requirements and subject to change.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – More frequent updates on major projects.Offer engineers the opportunity to select projects to work on.
